headline.print_headline: ‘I’m Here to Help,’ Trump  Assures Tech Executives During a Genial Meeting
headline.main: ‘I’m Here to Help,’ Trump Tells Tech Executives at Meeting

lead_paragraph: The president-elect met with Jeff Bezos of Amazon and Timothy D. Cook of Apple, among other tech leaders, in a surprisingly genial gathering.
snippet: The president-elect met with Jeff Bezos of Amazon and Timothy D. Cook of Apple, among other tech leaders, in a surprisingly genial gathering....
